title: [Caffe2] which kind of database can I read from caffe2
body_html:
I know caffe2 support lmdb, leveldb, hdf5. But after I move to the pytorch prebuilt by anaconda, I find all these features were turned off. Now I can't use Save, Load, CreateDB operators with the database formats I am familiar with.

I don't want build pytorch myself. that is too brutal to get these features. I just want to know which kind of database format is supported by default. Thx

I don't want build pytorch myself. that is too brutal to get these features. I just want to know which kind of database format is supported by default. Thx
